document_data.mainbody:
Furbleston was one of the employees of Lady Jannaths Estate in the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Furbleston was a hin man with a light skin tone, brown hair, dark blue eyes, and a splendorous rich servants outfit, which included an ornate top hat.
Circa the , Chamberlain Mercer, the man in charge of Lady Firelia Jannaths staff, dismissed all servants from the mansion on the mistresss orders. Mercer placed Furbleston, who was assigned serving tasks, Bailey, Cyrilla, Jooli, Phubbs, and Chef Marjoram on temporary leave with the pay of half-wages and allowance to seek temporary employment somewhere else. The chamberlain issued a statement that this dismissal was done at no imputation of malfeasance and would be ended upon notice.
